name: Undone Gunnery
description:
This game is an entry for the Weekly Game jam #256. The theme of this jam is Kite. 

An attractive piece of soap named Dave fell and crashed into a dungeon, which he has to get out of, while taking care of the birds and skeletons, that are not too fond of suprise guests such as your clean existance. Luckily, you did not enter that dungeon empty handed. You have a kite with you, which helps you with blocking attacks, attacking and gliding, but beware, you only have 1 Kite.

Co developers:

AndreWharn - https://andrewharn.carrd.co/

Dovarnian

Cover art by HombreRandom:

 Hombre Random - YouTube

https://twitter.com/ElNyrox

falling sfx intro;


controls:

left/right arrows = movement

space = jumping

X = gliding

C = attacking

V = blocking
